name: OdooAppsNewsbyPragmatic
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Odoo Apps News by Pragmatic is a daily briefing app which gives you information on the latest News, Events and Apps in the Odoo world. Odoo (www.odoo.com) is a very popular open source enterprise suite of application including apps for Sales, Purchase, CRM, Inventory, Accounting, ecommerce, POS. Though this briefing we intend to provide insights in to useful Odoo Apps as well as the latest News in the Odoo world. Odoo Apps are published in the App store https://www.odoo.com/apps

The briefings will cover details on Enterprise and Community Apps. It will provide overview information on apps which are very useful. We will also provide some tips and tricks to improve performance, scalability, reliability of the Odoo platform. We will review and go in to details of Odoo Apps to help people discover new useful Odoo business apps.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
